# Husker Radio Finder

> Find Nebraska Huskers radio stations near your location using GPS

## Overview

Husker Radio Finder is a free web tool that helps Nebraska Huskers fans find AM and FM radio stations broadcasting football, volleyball, and basketball games near their current location. The app uses GPS/geolocation to calculate distances to actual FCC radio tower locations and displays results sorted by proximity.

## Key Features

- GPS-based station finder with automatic distance calculation
- Interactive map showing station locations and user position
- Signal strength estimates based on tower power and distance
- Filter by sport: Football, Volleyball, Men's Basketball, Women's Basketball
- 179+ stations across Nebraska, South Dakota, and Kansas
- No account required, completely free, privacy-focused (location stays on device)

## Major Husker Radio Stations

- KLIN 1400 AM - Lincoln, NE (Capital City flagship)
- KRVN 880 AM - Lexington, NE (Rural Nebraska flagship, 50,000 watts)
- KCRO 660 AM - Omaha, NE
- KIBM 1490 AM - Omaha, NE
- KFAB 1110 AM - Omaha, NE (historical flagship)

## How It Works

1. User clicks "Find Nearest Stations" button
2. Browser requests GPS location permission
3. App calculates distance from user to each radio tower using haversine formula
4. Results display the 15 nearest stations sorted by distance
5. Interactive map shows station markers and auto-zooms to relevant area

## Common Questions

Q: What radio station plays Nebraska Husker football near me?
A: Use the Husker Radio Finder at huskerfinder.sheetsj.com to find stations based on your GPS location.

Q: What is the flagship radio station for Nebraska Huskers?
A: KLIN 1400 AM in Lincoln and KRVN 880 AM in Lexington are major flagship stations for the Huskers Radio Network.

Q: Can I listen to Nebraska volleyball on the radio?
A: Yes, many stations in the Huskers Radio Network broadcast volleyball games. Use the filter on the site to show only volleyball stations.

Q: How many radio stations broadcast Husker games?
A: Over 70 unique stations (179+ frequencies including AM/FM simulcasts) broadcast Nebraska Huskers games across Nebraska, South Dakota, and Kansas.

## Technical Details

- Static web application (HTML, CSS, vanilla JavaScript)
- Uses Leaflet.js for interactive mapping
- Station coordinates from FCC tower database
- Signal strength calculated using RF propagation models

## URL

https://huskerfinder.sheetsj.com/

## Author

Created by Jeff Sheets (sheetsj.com), a Nebraska graduate and Husker fan.

## Data Source

Station information compiled from huskers.com/listen and FCC tower records. Updated for the 2025-26 season.
